overview_of_class: This course is the second part in a four-course introductory biology sequence. You will learn fundamental principles in Human Physiology, covering all the major organ systems including Cardiovascular, Respiratory, Neural/Endocrine, Muscular, Renal/Digestive, Immune systems. You will also learn how different organ systems are structurally and functionally connected together to co-ordinate body functions. This course fulfills the requirements for medical, dental, and other professional school programs.
name: Physiology
subject: BIOL_SCI
